institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 32 (Notice of Participation)
contents: Article 32 (Notification of Participation) For national competitions, the Chairman of the Korean Committee, and for local competitions, the chairperson of the city/provincial committee shall notify participating athletes of the following information required for participation 10 days prior to the competition: 1. Participation guide, 2. List of tools to be brought. , 3. Other information required to participate in the competition
